title: OCE Dominion
body: Would anyone else like so have Dominion for the Oceanic servers?

replies.body: It's all right, but the novelty would soon wear off. I play it a little bit on my NA account (I love playing all the options that aren't available on OCE server like TT bots :3 ), and find people don't really play it that much. Like SoresuMakashi indicated, there are little communities in OCE that regularly set up dominion custom games.

Meh, just join custom games. DominateDominion chat channel, also.

Riot has already said why they're not enabling Dominion, and that's unlikely to change.
u guys do know that riot could easily do what they do with twisted treeline currently (that is make it available to everyone at certain times/days).
